description: Core Tetris data models and interfaces: defines coordinates, piece types, rotations, board state and shape configurations suitable for unit testing and UI-agnostic logic.

classes.name: Coord
classes.description: Represents a coordinate on the game board with utility for addition.

classes.name: Rotation
classes.description: Represents possible rotations for tetromino pieces, with methods for rotating clockwise and counter-clockwise.

classes.name: PieceState
classes.description: Holds current state of a tetromino including type, rotation, and origin; provides method to get occupied blocks.

classes.name: BoardCell
classes.description: Represents a cell in the game grid, indicating whether it is filled and its tetromino type if filled.

classes.name: BoardState
classes.description: Represents the game board grid with methods for querying, updating, and collision detection.

methods.name: blocks
methods.description: Returns block offsets for a given tetromino type and rotation.
